BUY.SHORT_GUIDE: Checkout what you can buy in our `>shop` !
BUY.MISSING_CATEGORY: **{0}**, Could you please specify the category?
BUY.MISSING_ROLENAME: You should include the role name!
BUY.ROLES_LVL_TOO_LOW: Sorry, to buy roles you need be at least level **25**.
BUY.BADGES_LIMIT: You have reached your max badges limit.
BUY.DUPLICATE_COVER: You are currently using that cover
BUY.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: Sorry **{0}**, it seems you don't have enough {1}.
BUY.INVALID_CATEGORY: That doesn't looks like a valid category.
BUY.MISSING_ITEMNAME: Don't forget to specify the item name
BUY.INVALID_ITEM: I can't find any item with that name . .

CHECKOUT.METADATA:
You are going to buy **{0} {1}** for {2} **{3}**.
Please type `y` to confirm your purchase.

CAPSULE.SHORT_GUIDE: You can use your power capsules and gain the exp by typing `>eat <amount>`.
CAPSULE.ZERO: You don't have any power capsules left.

CARTCOIN.SHORT_GUIDE:
You can start converting your artcoins into exp by typing `>cartcoin <amount/all>`
**The conversion rate is 1:2**
CARTCOIN.INSUFFICIENT_AMOUNT: You only have {0}**{1}** artcoins. Grind harder!
CARTCOIN.INVALID_AMOUNT: To use the converter, you need to put atleast **2 artcoins.**
CARTCOIN.SUCCESSFUL: **{0}** has converted {1} **{2}** artcoins and gained **+{3} EXP**

DAILY.IN_COOLDOWN: You can take your dailies again **{0}**

EVJOIN.ALREADY_HAS: **{0}** you have unused ticket, go submit your art now!
EVJOIN.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: You don't have enough artcoins to participate in the current event.
EVJOIN.FOXIES_BLESSING: No charge will be applied with Foxie's Blessing.

EVAL.UNKNOWN_AUTHOR: **<!> You are not authorized to access this feature.**

ASK.SHORT_GUIDE: Feel free to ask me anything!

ADDAC.SHORT_GUIDE: You can refill user's artcoins by typing `>addac <user> <amount>`
ADDAC.NEGATIVE_VALUES: Sorry, you can't put negative value.

UNAUTHORIZED_ACCESS: You are not authorized to use administrator-level feature.

WRONG.FILE: I'm sorry but that command/group doesn't exist, please do `help help` for more info
WRONG.ROLE: I'm sorry but you do not have the requried role for this/these command(s)
